Graphics¶

The Graphic module for simulation, will plot a figure in the process of simulation like e.g.,

class biosim.Graphics.Graphics(island_map, img_dir=None, img_base=None, img_fmt=None, hist_specs=None, ymax_animals=None)[source]¶

Provides graphics support for BioSim.

Parameters:

  • island_map (str) – Multi-line string specifying island geography

  • img_dir (str) – The directory where the figures to be saved.

  • img_base (str) – The base name of figures to be saved.

  • img_fmt (str) – The format of figures to be saved.

  • hist_specs (dictionary) – The maximum of x-axis and the bin width for the histogram.

  • ymax_animals (int or float) – The maximum of y-axis of the amount of fauna axes

add_age()[source]¶

Add the age histogram into the figure.

add_carnivores_distribute(cmax_animals)[source]¶

Add the carnivores distribute colormap into the figure.

add_fauna_amount(final_years)[source]¶

Add the fauna amount axes into the figure.

add_fitness()[source]¶

Add the fitness histogram into the figure.

add_herbivores_distribute(cmax_animals)[source]¶

Add the herbivores distribute colormap into the figure.

add_map()[source]¶

Add island map into the figure

add_weight()[source]¶

Add the weight histogram into the figure.

add_year_counter()[source]¶

Add the year counter into the figure.

make_movie(movie_fmt=None)[source]¶

Creates MPEG4 movie from visualization images saved.

The movie is stored as img_base + movie_fmt

save_graphics()[source]¶

Saves graphics to file if file name is given.

setup(final_years, img_years, cmax_animals=None)[source]¶

Prepare graphics.

Parameters:

  • final_years (int) – Last year to be visualised.

  • img_years (int) – Interval between saving image to file.

  • cmax_animals (dictionary) – Color-scale limits for animal densities.

update_age(year, h_age_list, c_age_list)[source]¶

update the age distribute histogram in the figure.

update_carnivores_distribute(distribution)[source]¶

update the carnivores distribute colormap in the figure.

update_fauna_amount(year, h_num, c_num)[source]¶

update the fauna_amount axes in the figure.

update_fitness(year, h_fitness_list, c_fitness_list)[source]¶

update the fitness distribute histogram in the figure.

update_herbivores_distribute(distribution)[source]¶

update the herbivores distribute colormap in the figure.

update_weight(year, h_weight_list, c_weight_list)[source]¶

update the weight distribute histogram in the figure.

update_year_counter(year)[source]¶

update the year counter in the figure.
